Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-27538 affecting package rust for versions less than 1.72.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-27538 affecting package rust for versions less than 1.72.0-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package rust is earlier than 1.72.0-2, affected by CVE-2023-27538
